item.title: Tools
item.description: Makefile Make Basic make is designed to manage the compiling process based on dependencies. The other functions of make is designed to make it easier to write Makefile. When we deal with a complex project, there might be lots of source files, header files, lib files, target files. The files have a certain dependency relationship. $ gcc -c -o test.o test.c $ gcc -o helloworld test.o The dependency line is: test.
